title: Bridge Response Message
description: A response message from the Bridge back to the original Desktop Agent that raised the request.

type.title: Response Message Type
type.description: Identifies the type of the message and it is typically set to the FDC3 function name that the message relates to, e.g. 'findIntent', with 'Response' appended.

payload.title: Response Message Payload
payload.description: The message payload typically contains return values for FDC3 API functions.

BridgeResponseMeta.title: Bridge Response Metadata
BridgeResponseMeta.description: Metadata required in a response message collated and/or forwarded on by the Bridge

requestUuid.description: UUID for the request this message is responding to

responseUuid.description: Unique UUID for this collated response (generated by the bridge).

timestamp.description: Timestamp at which the response was generated

sources.title: Desktop Agents that responded
sources.description: Array of AppIdentifiers or DesktopAgentIdentifiers for the sources that generated responses to the request. Will contain a single value for individual responses and multiple values for responses that were collated by the bridge. May be omitted if all sources errored. MUST include the `desktopAgent` field when returned by the bridge.

errorSources.title: Desktop Agents that errored
errorSources.description: Array of AppIdentifiers or DesktopAgentIdentifiers for responses that were not returned to the bridge before the timeout or because an error occurred. May be omitted if all sources responded without errors. MUST include the `desktopAgent` field when returned by the bridge.

errorDetails.title: Detail of errors returned
errorDetails.description: Array of error message strings for responses that were not returned to the bridge before the timeout or because an error occurred. Should be the same length as the `errorSources` array and ordered the same. May be omitted if all sources responded without errors.
